Blog.post: well,to begin..i woke up @ arnd 7+ lah..early in d morning ald i go n bath..whahahx{of coz}!like duh!okok..then i sat infront of the comp 4 abt a few hours la..then lot of strange ppl started to add me @ both frenster n msn..i really dun haf any idea who teh hack they are man!well,the purpose they added me,iz tt...they wanted to know more bt mie..ttz fine with me lah..then..weeee..some1 onelinE!itz my classmate lah..he turn out to b my admirer..{ttz tough one} suddenly he feeling2 ahh..he express hiz love towards me..i want to avoid hiz cousin tt also admires me,but then...both of them are now same!my god!wad a nightmare!i hope it will end soon!i mean..i dun blame them 4 loving mie..hehehe.. in the evening,i went to my nenek's condo apartment lah..my brother wanted to go swimming mah..but i juz go lah..though i didnt want to swim..then!i nearly 4gotten abt the match!!finally!!japan won!hehehex...so happy!lol*winkx* well..ttz all 4 todae..my eyes cant stand to hold any longer man... WeLL, ~~SiGninG oFF~~ pInk-FreaK-GurL-HazeL Love ya aLL

WeLL, ~~SiGninG oFF~~ pInk-FreaK-GurL-HazeL Love ya aLL

deAr diaRy..i ReaLLy felt that miserable for thiz whole week..well,i end off my week witha sad ending.. weLl,i did tRy to Sms Him 4 Quite a number oF tyMes..buT thEn..itz woRthless..i'M soo Damn Sad!down!arggh!itz SeeMx hE's tryIng to AvoiD me..i ReaLlY had A Big CruSh On hiM...Hope That hE dun Know bT this..iF noT,iM GonA bE daMn frEak out n damn emBarraseD!eveY sIngle Day i WaiteD 4 Him To onLinE @ msN...buT theN..macam Buah taK jaTuh Pon..My goD hazEl!u sounded LikE u aRe sOo DesPerate 4 a Guy!!!nvM..itz not That Wad I meaN..buT..Y iS he So MEan?dun WanT to ReplY mY meSsaGes?!damN anGry!arrgh!!nvm!!waD comeS wOrsT is That,MY HP LINE WAS CUT OFF!!WAD THE FUCK!mY goD!my BiLL waS noT thaT higH Mah!?itX onLy $300+..bettEr Than My PreV biLL..WhicH CosTs ArnD $1000+ maN!i CaN beT thaT u GuyS whEN reAdinG thiS bLog,ConfIrm EyeS poPpiNg coZ reAdinG thaT my BiLL e HigHest waS $1000+...& guEss Wad?I'M onLy seC1 Gurl & usEd A hP Line ThaT coSt OveR thE lImit!hehehehx..i DunnO y I useD thE phOne OveR limiT!i teLL u hoR..iF soMeonE smS me/caLL me,i cOnfirM wIll nv FaiL to EntertaIn them Back!thAts The proB i guEss{thinKing thaT my Bill wiLL be $100 n beLowBut,maN!tOO baD larH!it does'T!!} i FeLt LikE CryIng..But heY!4 What ryTe?!noW i'S saVinG uP mY moNey To Buy PrePaiD caRd aGain!im SucH a CluMsy Gal u knOW?How CareLess Am I..Haix!i Miz PlacED my PrepaiD caRd n AnoTher Hi Card...HaiX..mayBe i LosT it..oR 4gotteN whEre i Put Them...Now i Haf To wAste My $$ aGaiN to Buy A neW onE! weLL,i DuNNo Wad ElsE to Add On..So i GueSS i ShoUld eNd my Blog Here..iF i GorT anY neW idEas strucK on My miNd,theN i'll RytE anoTher BloG 4 TodaE... ``!!SiGninG oFF!!`` ~~||++pInK-FreKo++||~~ {muAcKx}LurVe yA aLL*wiNkx*
